item.title: 特朗普称巴基斯坦代表下周将赴美参加贸易谈判
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周五表示，巴基斯坦代表将于下周访问美国，因为这个南亚国家正在寻求就关税问题达成协议。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Friday representatives from Pakistan are coming to the United States next week as the South Asian country seeks to make a deal on tariffs.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会提出保持预算持平、降低人员编制的计划
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会周五表示，要求国会维持明年的预算不变，并在近期大幅裁员后大幅精简人员。【原文：The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission on Friday said it was asking Congress to keep its budget unchanged next year and its workforce significantly leaner following recent deep staff cuts.】

item.title: 福克斯商业》报道：美联储主席戴利：4 月份 PCE 通胀 "令人欣慰"，但并不全面
item.description: 旧金山联邦储备银行行长玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）周五表示，通胀降温为饱受高物价之苦的美国人提供了 "解脱"，但未来存在通胀走高的风险。【原文：San Francisco Federal Reserve Bank President Mary Daly said on Friday cooling inflation offers "relief" for Americans suffering from high prices, but that there are risks of higher inflation ahead.】

item.title: 禁止仿制减肥药，Hims 将裁员 4
item.description: 远程医疗平台 Hims & Hers 周五表示，由于美国禁止大量生产减肥药 Wegovy，该公司将裁员 68 人，约占员工总数的 4%。【原文：Telehealth platform Hims & Hers said on Friday it will cut 68 employees, or about 4% of its workforce, as it adjusts to a U.S. ban on manufacturing mass copies of the weight-loss drug Wegovy.】

item.title: 特朗普称计划将钢铁关税提高一倍至 50
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周五表示，他计划将外国进口钢铁的关税从25%提高到50%，从而加大对全球钢铁生产商的压力，并誓言要深化贸易战。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Friday said he planned to increase tariffs on foreign imports of steel from 25% to 50%, ratcheting up pressure on global steel producers and vowing to deepen his trade war.】

item.title: 从 TACO 到 FAFO，投资者喜欢模仿特朗普的缩写词
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的第二个任期已经开始四个月了，市场观察家们从他喜欢把口号浓缩成 MAGA、DOGE 和 MAHA 等朗朗上口的缩写词中得到启发，设计出了一些自己的缩写词，并在交易台上传播开来。【原文：Four months into President Donald Trump's second term, market observers have taken a cue from his fondness for condensing slogans into catchy acronyms like MAGA, DOGE and MAHA, and devised a few of their own that have been spreading across trading desks.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，巴斯夫开始出售涂料业务，估值约 68 亿美元
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周五报道，德国化学品制造商巴斯夫公司（BASF SE）最近几周向潜在的收购者发出了出售其涂料业务的信息，估值约为60亿欧元（68.1亿美元）。【原文：German chemicals maker BASF SE has in recent weeks sent out information to potential suitors for a sale of its coatings business at a valuation of about 6 billion euros ($6.81 billion), Bloomberg News reported on Friday.】

item.title: 交易日：市场重新 "分级
item.description: - 交易日【原文：- TRADING DAY】

item.title: 特朗普称特斯拉等汽车制造商必须在美国生产汽车和零部件
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周五表示，包括特斯拉在内的美国汽车制造商必须在美国制造包括所有零部件在内的整车，而不是在国外制造零部件。【原文：Automakers in the United States, including Tesla , must build entire vehicles including all their parts in the country instead of manufacturing parts abroad, President Donald Trump said on Friday.】

item.title: 独家报道：Anthropic 因企业对人工智能的需求，年收入达到 30 亿美元
item.description: 据两位熟知内情的消息人士透露，人工智能开发商 Anthropic 的年收入约为 30 亿美元，这是在商业领域使用生成式人工智能的早期验证。【原文：Artificial intelligence developer Anthropic is making about $3 billion in annualized revenue, according to two sources familiar with the matter, in an early validation of generative AI use in the business world.】

item.title: 独家报道：汽车制造商警告：中国磁铁挤压威胁汽车生产
item.description: 从挡风玻璃雨刷电机到防抱死制动传感器，美国汽车业高管们对即将出现的来自中国的稀土磁铁短缺敲响了警钟。【原文：U.S. auto executives are sounding the alarm on an impending shortage of rare-earth magnets from China – used in everything from windshield-wiper motors to anti-lock braking sensors – that could force the closure of car factories within weeks.】

item.title: 据 Semafor 报道，加州对派拉蒙公司是否违反州贿赂和竞争法展开调查
item.description: 据 Semafor 周五报道，加利福尼亚州参议院已开始调查派拉蒙公司是否违反了禁止贿赂和不公平竞争的州法律。【原文：The California State Senate has opened an inquiry into whether Paramount violated state laws against bribery and unfair competition, Semafor reported on Friday.】

item.title: 特朗普希望在预算法案中加大减税力度
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统说，他希望看到美国众议院通过的预算法案中能有更大力度的减税措施。【原文：President Donald Trump said he wants to see bigger tax cuts in the budget bill passed by the U.S. House of Representatives.】

item.title: Skechers 股东起诉鞋类制造商，要求提供 94 亿美元 3G 收购案的详情
item.description: Skechers 美国公司的一名股东起诉了这家鞋类制造商，要求其提供有关私募股权公司 3G Capital 以 94 亿美元收购该公司的更多细节，称 Skechers 创始人兼控股股东的出售决定引发了 "警示"。【原文：A Skechers USA shareholder has sued the footwear maker for more details about its $9.4 billion buyout by private equity firm 3G Capital, saying the decision by Skechers' founder and controlling shareholder to sell raises "red flags."】

item.title: 切尼尔能源公司证实萨宾帕斯液化天然气工厂开始维护工作
item.description: 切尼尔能源公司表示，美国最大的液化天然气工厂 Sabine Pass 的年度维护工作已经开始。【原文：Annual maintenance work on the largest U.S. LNG plant, Sabine Pass, has begun, Cheniere Energy said.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，由于预期汽车交付量下滑，Rivian 着眼于新的债务交易
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周五援引熟悉该交易的人士的话报道，Rivian Automotive 公司正与摩根大通合作进行潜在的高收益债券销售，部分目的是为即将到来的债务进行再融资。【原文：Rivian Automotive is working with JPMorgan Chase on a potential high-yield bond sale, in part to refinance its upcoming debt, Bloomberg News reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the transaction.】

item.title: 据 CNBC 报道，摩根大通戴蒙称美国应向套利征税
item.description: 据 CNBC 周五报道，摩根大通首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）在里根国家经济论坛上表示，美国应该对套利征税。【原文：JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon said at the Reagan National Economic Forum that the U.S. should be taxing carried interest, CNBC reported on Friday.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：汇丰将解散为中小企业服务的美国部门
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周五报道，汇丰银行正在解散一个为美国中小型公司服务的部门，大约 4500 名客户将受到影响。【原文：HSBC is disbanding a division that serves small and medium-size companies in the U.S. affecting roughly 4,500 clients, the Wall Street Journal reported on Friday.】

item.title: 豪迈首席执行官表示，随着喷气机产量的增加，豪迈需要提高发动机零部件的产量
item.description: 豪迈宇航公司（Howmet Aerospace）首席执行官约翰-普兰特（John Plant）周五表示，随着波音和空客窄体喷气式飞机产量的增加和备件需求的增长，该公司今年将需要为波音和空客窄体喷气式飞机使用的发动机生产更多的零部件。【原文：Howmet Aerospace will need to produce more parts this year for engines used in Boeing and Airbus narrowbody jets, as the planemakers ramp up output and the need for spares grows, the parts supplier's CEO John Plant said on Friday.】

item.title: 巴西 Azul 公司高管表示，公司目标是在 2026 年初退出破产保护程序
item.description: 巴西 Azul 航空公司机构和企业副总裁 Fabio Campos 在周五的新闻发布会上告诉记者，该公司的目标是在明年初退出破产保护程序。【原文：Brazilian airline Azul aims to exit Chapter 11 proceedings early next year, Fabio Campos, institutional and corporate vice-president, told reporters in a press conference on Friday.】

item.title: 特朗普关税事件中需要追踪的重要事件和日期
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税政策一波三折，不仅震撼了全球金融市场，也让投资者们坐上了过山车。【原文：The twists and turns in U.S. President Donald Trump's tariff policies have not only rattled global financial markets but have also taken investors on a roller-coaster ride.】

item.title: 德国数字部对网络平台征税持谨慎态度
item.description: 德国新成立的数字部表示，对网络平台征收的任何税费都必须经过国际协调，并且不会导致终端消费者的价格上涨。【原文：Germany's new digital ministry said any levy on online platforms would have to be internationally coordinated and not result in higher prices for end consumers, in a sign on Friday of possible divisions within government over plans for such a tax.】

item.title: 美国砍掉 24 个清洁能源项目，包括埃克森湾镇项目
item.description: 美国能源部周五表示，美国已取消了前总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）执政期间颁发的总额超过 37 亿美元的 24 个绿色能源项目，其中包括埃克森（Exxon）在得克萨斯州的一个炼油厂。【原文：The U.S. has axed awards to 24 green energy projects including to an Exxon refinery complex in Texas issued during former President Joe Biden's administration that totaled more than $3.7 billion, the Energy Department said on Friday.】

item.title: 数据库显示微软俄罗斯分公司将申请破产
item.description: 根据周五在官方 Fedresurs 注册表上公布的一份说明，微软公司在俄罗斯的一家子公司计划申请破产。【原文：One of Microsoft Corp's subsidiaries in Russia plans to file for bankruptcy, according to a note published on the official Fedresurs registry on Friday.】

item.title: Gap股价下滑，关税阴影笼罩服装制造商的扭亏计划
item.description: Gap 股价周五早盘下跌 20%，此前 Old Navy 的所有者警告称，美国关税将挤压今年的利润，尽管这家服装制造商希望通过供应链多元化和投资美国棉花来缓解这一打击。【原文：Gap shares fell 20% in early trading on Friday after the Old Navy owner warned that U.S. tariffs would squeeze this year's profit, even as the apparel maker aims to soften the blow by diversifying its supply chain and investing in U.S. cotton.】

item.title: 全球经济的 "糖衣炮弹 "暂时抵挡住了贸易大戏的冲击
item.description: 尽管围绕美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易关税闹得沸沸扬扬，但世界经济的表现却好于许多人的预期。【原文：For all the drama surrounding U.S. President Donald Trump's trade tariffs, the world economy is holding up better than many had expected.】

item.title: 巴西 Meliuz 公司发行股票购买比特币
item.description: 巴西金融科技公司Meliuz表示，该公司已申请首次发行股票，目的是为收购比特币筹集资金，定价时间定于6月12日。【原文：Brazilian fintech Meliuz said it has filed for a primary offering of shares with the aim of raising funds for the acquisition of bitcoin, with pricing scheduled for June 12.】

item.title: VIEW 美国 4 月通胀不温不火，消费支出放缓
item.description: 美国4月份的通胀情况良好，零售商可能仍在销售关税之前积累的库存。数据显示，个人消费支出（PCE）价格指数在3月份保持不变后，上个月上涨了0.1%。【原文：U.S. inflation was benign in April, with retailers likely still selling inventory accumulated before the tariffs. The Personal Consumption Expenditures (PCE) Price Index rose 0.1% last month after being unchanged in March, data showed.】

item.title: 美国 4 月消费支出放缓；通胀温和上升
item.description: 美国消费者支出在 4 月份小幅增长，原因是为抵御进口关税带来的价格上涨而采取的应急措施有所放缓。【原文：U.S. consumer spending increased marginally in April as a rush to beat higher prices from import duties slowed.】

item.title: 美国通胀降温，交易员继续押注美联储 9 月降息
item.description: 周五，以美联储政策利率为结算基准的期货交易者继续押注美国央行将在9月份下调短期借贷成本目标，此前美联储的目标通胀率在4月份降至2.1%。【原文：Traders of futures that settle to the Federal Reserve's policy rate continued to bet on Friday that the U.S. central bank will cut its target for short-term borrowing costs in September, after inflation by the Fed's targeted measure cooled to 2.1% in April.】
